name: Editor

properties1.name: name
properties1.description: (mandatory) is the unique name of the parameter.

properties2.name: label
properties2.description: (mandatory) (translatable) is the descriptive title of the field.

properties4.name: description
properties4.description: (optional) (translatable) is text that will be shown as a tooltip when the user moves the mouse over the label.

properties5.name: message
properties5.description: (optional) (translatable) is text that will be shown as error on validation.

properties6.name: width
properties6.description: (optional) defines the width (in pixels) of the wysiwyg editor and defaults to 100%.

properties7.name: height
properties7.description: (optional) defines the height (in pixels) of the wysiwyg editor and defaults to 250px.

properties8.name: cols
properties8.description: (optional) defines the width of the editor (in columns).

properties9.name: rows
properties9.description: (optional) defines the height of the editor (in rows).

properties10.name: buttons
properties10.description: (optional) can be an array of plugin buttons to be excluded or set to false. The default editors-xtd are: article, image, pagebreak and readmore.

properties11.name: syntax
properties11.description: (optional) can be used to set the code syntax matching for this field.

properties12.name: hide
properties12.description: (optional) array of plugin buttons to be hidden. eg... set buttons="true" hide="readmore,pagebreak"

properties13.name: editor
properties13.description: specifies the editor to be used and can include two options (editor="desired|alternative")

properties14.name: filter
properties14.description: (optional) allow the system to save certain html tags or raw data.

properties15.name: required
properties15.description: (optional) The field must be filled before submitting the form.

properties16.name: validate
properties16.description: (optional) The validation method for the form field.  This value will determine which method is used to validate the value for a field.

properties17.name: showon
properties17.description: (optional) show this field on the bases of the value in another field. https://joomla.stackexchange.com/a/17682/2166

description: The Editor field type provides a WYSIWYG (What You See Is What You Get) editor for rich text input, allowing users to format content visually without writing HTML.
